refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This manual page documents the &package; command.
&package; is a tool to build Debian packages in an isolated environment, using nspawn containers. See systemd-nspawn(1) for more information on the used container technology.

refsect1.title: Subcommands
refsect1.para: &package; actions are invoked via subcommands. Refer to their individual manual pages for further details.

listitem.para: Create a new container base image for a specific suite, architecture and variant. A custom mirror can also be provided. For details, see debspawn-create(1).
Delete a container base image and all data associated with it. For details, see debspawn-delete(1).
